title: Seymour River Canyon
whats_it_like: Classic kayaking in a deep box canyon.  You would never know it's in the heart of North Van.

difficulty.text: Highly level dependent - ranges from fun class IV to raging class V.

scouting_portaging: Moderate scouting, difficult to impossible portaging.

time.original: 1.5 hours including the hike for a first run.

when_to_go: Rain-fed all year, snowmelt in the spring and summer.
